meanings.definition: A device for capturing images or recording videos.
meanings.sent1: I used my camera to take a picture of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her camera with her to capture special moments.
meanings.sent3: The camera seemed to have a mind of its own, snapping photos at random.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like a camera, capturing every detail of the scene before her.
meanings.sent5: The camera clicked, freezing the moment in time forever.

meanings.definition: A room or building used for taking photographs.
meanings.sent1: The photography studio had various backdrops for different shoots.
meanings.sent2: The camera was equipped with professional lighting for the photo shoot.
meanings.sent3: The camera room was filled with props and equipment, ready for the next session.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a camera studio, storing memories in each corner.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the camera felt like stepping into a world of creativity.

meanings.sent1: The tiny camera in the watch was used for secret recordings.
meanings.sent2: He found a hidden camera in the wall, monitoring the room.
meanings.sent3: The camera in the toy car was a clever way to spy on his sister.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a camera, capturing fleeting emotions in its small space.
meanings.sent5: The camera in the birdhouse provided a unique view of the garden.
